Article Title: 'Vanished in minutes': Virat Kohli fever sells out Vizag ODI; Kaif's viral post captures crowd frenzy
Article Text:
Virat Kohli and Arshdeep Singh at Vizag. (Pic credit: BCCI)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Ruturaj Gaikwad press conference: Reveals Gautam Gambhir message, No.4 and more

Poll Do you believe Kohli can maintain this form for the upcoming matches? Yes, he can No, it's temporary I'm not sure

NEW DELHI: Virat Kohli hasn‚Äôt just returned to form ‚Äî he has set off a nationwide frenzy strong enough to sell out an entire stadium. Back-to-back centuries in Ranchi and Raipur have turned what was shaping up to be a low-interest ODI in Visakhapatnam into the hottest cricket ticket in India this week. According to officials at the Andhra Cricket Association (ACA), Kohli‚Äôs stunning run-scoring spree single-handedly reversed sluggish online bookings for the third ODI against South Africa at the Dr. Y.S. Rajasekhara Reddy ACA-VDCA Stadium.When tickets first went on sale digitally on November 28, the association braced for a disappointing turnout. The lack of buzz even pushed the ACA towards the rare option of setting up offline ticket counters despite committing to a fully digital system this time. But everything changed the moment Kohli unfurled a spectacular century in Ranchi on November 30. Suddenly, Phase 2 and 3 of ticket sales disappeared in minutes.‚ÄúThe first phase response wasn‚Äôt good,‚Äù confirmed Y. Venkatesh from ACA‚Äôs Media and Operations department to The Indian Express. ‚ÄúAfter Kohli‚Äôs hundred at Ranchi, the second and third phases vanished in minutes. Nothing was left unsold.‚ÄùIt wasn‚Äôt just victory that fans chased ‚Äî it was the chance to witness a phenomenon.Kohli‚Äôs numbers in Vizag fuelled the madness: an average of 97.83 in seven ODIs, featuring three centuries and a 99. Even ticket prices ranging from Rs 1,200 to Rs 18,000 couldn‚Äôt slow demand.The frenzy spilled into real life, too. Hours before Team India landed in Vizag, hundreds gathered at the airport, waiting through repeated flight delays from Raipur. Security guards were bombarded with one question in multiple languages: ‚ÄúWhen are they landing?‚Äù The answer mattered because Kohli was on board.After his 53rd ODI century in Raipur, cricket legends poured in praise. But the loudest came from Mohammad Kaif, who summed up a nation‚Äôs emotion in eight simple words: ‚ÄúWithout Kohli cricket is nothing‚Ä¶ pure vintage!‚Äù
Article Summary: Back-to-back centuries in ranchi and raipur have turned what was shaping up to be a low-interest odi in visakhapatnam into the hottest cricket ticket in india this week. According to officials at the andhra cricket association, kohli‚Äôs stunning run-scoring spree single-handedly reversed sluggish online bookings for the third odi.

Article Title: Wedding cancelled! What Smriti Mandhana and Palash Muchhal said in their statements
Article Text:
Smriti Mandhana and Palash Muchhal

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Fakhar Zaman interview: Power hitting, playing role of mentor in ILT20, hitting sixes & more

Smriti Mandhana's post

Palash Muchhal's post

Indian women's cricket team vice-captain Smriti Mandhana has officially addressed the end of her engagement with music composer Palash Muchhal , ending weeks of social media speculation.Mandhana shared her statement on Instagram, marking her first public response to the situation."I need to clarify that the wedding is called off. I would like to close this matter here and implore all of you to do the same. Over the past few weeks there has been plenty of speculation around my life, and I feel it is important for me to speak out at this time," she wrote."I believe there is a higher purpose driving us all and for me that has always been representing my country at the highest level. I hope to continue to play and win trophies for India for as long as possible."Thank you for all your support. It's time to move forward."The wedding was initially scheduled for November 23 but was postponed after Mandhana's father, Shriniwas, was hospitalised due to a heart condition.Palash Muchhal also shared his perspective on Instagram regarding the situation."I have decided to move on in my life and step back from my personal relationship. Its been very difficult for me to see people react so easily on baseless rumours about something which has been most sacred to me.Its the most difficult phase of my life and I will deal with it gracefully holding on to my beliefs."I truly hope we, as a society, learn to pause before judging someone based on unverified gossip, whose sources are never identified. Our words can wound in ways we may never understand. While we think about these things, many people in the world are facing drastic consequences. My team will be taking strict legal action against those spreading false and defamatory content."Thank you to everyone who has stood by me with kindness in this tough time."Both individuals have expressed their desire to move forward and requested privacy during this period.
Article Summary: Indian women's cricket team vice-captain smriti mandhana has officially addressed the end of her engagement with music composer palash muchhal. "i need to clarify that the wedding is called off. I would like to close this matter here and implore all of you to do the same," she wrote.

Article Title: Serena Williams and Venus Williams combined net worth in 2025: Tennis sisters, earnings, endorsements, business, career and more
Article Text:
Serena Williams and Venus Williams combined net worth in 2025: Tennis sisters, earnings, endorsements, business, career and more (Image via Getty)

Serena Williams and Venus Williams net worth in 2025

Serena Williams tennis earnings and prize money

Venus Williams tennis earnings and prize money

Serena Williams endorsements and business work

Venus Williams endorsements and business work

Serena Williams and Venus Williams are two of the most famous sisters in sports. They are great tennis players and also very strong businesswomen. In 2025, trusted reports say Serena‚Äôs net worth is about 350 million dollars, and Venus‚Äôs net worth is about 90‚Äì95 million dollars. This means their combined net worth is around 440‚Äì445 million dollars. They make money from tennis, brand deals, business work, and smart investments. They stay very active even after many years in the sport.Forbes lists Serena Williams with a net worth of about 350 million dollars in 2025. This comes from her prize money, big brand deals, and her investment company.Business Insider reports that Venus Williams is worth 90‚Äì95 million dollars. When we put the numbers together, the sisters are worth 440‚Äì445 million dollars, making them one of the richest sister teams in world sports.Serena won 23 Grand Slam singles titles, the most in modern women‚Äôs tennis. The WTA confirms she earned about 94.8 million dollars in prize money, which is the highest amount ever for a woman tennis player.Her long run at the top of the sport helped her build a very strong financial base that still grows today through her businesses.According to the WTA, Venus Williams has earned around 42 million dollars in prize money during her more than 30-year tennis career. She won 7 Grand Slam singles titles and many more in doubles with Serena. Her long time in the sport helped her earn steady money and build her own business path.Serena Williams has worked with Nike, Gatorade, Wilson, Rolex, Beats by Dre, and many more big brands. In 2025, she became a global ambassador for Ro, a major health company, which Ro confirmed on its official site.Serena also runs Serena Ventures, which has invested in 70‚Äì85 startups, including several unicorns worth more than 1 billion dollars. She also launched WYN Beauty and has a small stake in the new WNBA team in Toronto.Venus Williams has worked with Nike, Gatorade, Wilson, and Porsche. She owns the activewear brand EleVen and her interior design company V Starr. Reports say these brands bring in strong money each year.In 2025, the tennis sisters also worked on a new video podcast set to release on X, giving fans a new way to see them together.Also Read: Aryna Sabalenka and Georgios Frangulis combined net worth: Tennis earnings, endorsements, business, relationship and more
Article Summary: Serena williams and venus williams are two of the most famous sisters in sports. They are great tennis players and also very strong businesswomen. In 2025, trusted reports say serena‚Äôs net worth is about 350 million dollars. This means their combined networth is around 440‚Äì445 million dollars, making them one of the richest sister teams in world sports.

Article Title: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not gonna lie‚Äù: Naomi Osaka turns down marriage proposal and speaks openly about hard days as a new mother
Article Text:
Naomi Osaka turns down marriage proposal and speaks openly about hard days as a new mother (Image via Getty)

Naomi Osaka reflects on gratitude, daughter Shai, and her 2025 season



Naomi Osaka is away from the tennis court, but she is still sharing honest moments from her life. The four-time Grand Slam winner recently held a question-and-answer session on her Instagram Stories. During the session, she rejected a marriage offer from a fan, spoke openly about how hard motherhood felt at first, and reflected on her 2025 tennis season. Her answers were simple, real, and emotional, which made fans feel close to her story.Naomi Osaka ended her 2025 season at the Japan Open after she pulled out of the quarterfinal due to an injury. The injury brought her season to an early stop. Since then, she has been resting and spending time with her daughter, Shai. While taking this break, she decided to interact with fans online and answer their questions honestly, without hiding her struggles or feelings.One fan, who was also a new mother, shared that she was having a hard time with the sudden change in her life and sense of self. She asked Naomi Osaka for advice. The tennis star replied with complete honesty.‚ÄúI‚Äôm not going to lie to you I also struggled tremendously, your life changes overnight.I think for me I journaled a lot to keep track of how I felt, I was also lucky because I could play tennis and being on the court was a place of comfort for me. I would suggest you make time to do things that make you happy and also enjoy your new role because I promise you the time is going to go so quick and before you know it your baby is going to be talking back to you with sass,‚Äù Naomi Osaka wrote on Instagram Stories.Soon after, another fan asked her to marry him. Naomi Osaka looked surprised and responded in a light and honest way.‚ÄúI‚Äôm confused by questions like this because you don‚Äôt know me Insane commitment from your end lol,‚Äù she replied, also on Instagram Stories.When asked about her biggest achievement in the 2025 season, Naomi Osaka did not talk about titles or wins.‚ÄúNo achievement sticks out but I‚Äôm proud that I didn‚Äôt give up on myself,‚Äù she wrote.After the season ended, Naomi Osaka shared a longer message on Instagram. She looked back at the year with gratitude, even though injuries slowed her down. She began the season at the ASB Classic in Auckland and reached the final there.‚ÄúTook me a while to get my thoughts together but here‚Äôs my end of year recap for 2025. When I sit and think about it I just feel very thankful for this year. I‚Äôm thankful for my health and being able to wake up each day ready to chase my dreams. I‚Äôm also grateful for being able to travel and see the world with my daughter,‚Äù Naomi Osaka wrote.She also thanked her supporters for standing by her.‚ÄúI‚Äôm so honored that I have such amazing people that support me‚Ä¶ thank you infinitely for it,‚Äù she added.Naomi Osaka is expected to start her 2026 season at the ASB Classic in Auckland.Also Read: Serena Williams And Venus Williams Combined Net Worth In 2025: Tennis Sisters, Earnings, Endorsements, Business, Career And More
Article Summary: Naomi osaka held a question-and-answer session on her instagram stories. During the session, she rejected a marriage offer from a fan. She also spoke openly about how hard motherhood felt at first. Naomi osaka ended her 2025 season at the japan open due to an injury.

Article Title: How did Cody Beef Franke die? Inside the tragic end of the Barstool Sports star
Article Text:
Cody Beef Franke (Image Source: barstoolyak/Instagram)

Cody Franke‚Äôs final days and what reportedly happened

Tributes pour in for Cody Franke‚Äôs lasting impact

‚Äúyou will never find a nicer or more genuine person than Beef,‚Äù

to him, seeing golf make people happy, made him happy.‚Äù

Cody "Beef" Franke, who quickly became a fan favorite on Barstool Sports' Fore Play golf podcast, has passed away at 31 after what has been called a "sudden medical event." Barstool Sports confirmed the tragic news earlier this week, and fans and colleagues were crushed. His personality, humor, and love for golf were infectious, and in no time, Franke had developed a quick following all over the Barstool universe, and even outside of it.Based on several reports, Cody Franke experienced a medical emergency while in the Dominican Republic attending a wedding. Barstool Sports reported, while not disclosing a specific cause of death, that he died from a sudden health issue over the weekend, calling the incident unexpected and sudden.Cody Franke, who was a former PGA professional, had come on board with Barstool Sports earlier in 2025 to serve as the Lead Golf Pro for the company's golf wing. With instructional videos, swing tips and relatable golf content, he developed a reputation for being not only a great golfer but an accessible one at that. His genuine personality and positive nature made him one of the more prominent figures in golf content.Colleagues said he was always kind, on and off the course. Perhaps the most famous piece of body language he used was taking his hat off as a gesture of respect, which had become a trademark of his person and a way of symbolizing the kindness that characterized him.Also Read: Mannat ends T-13th, Chinese reign supreme at Asian Youth Games golf Following the devastating announcement, tributes poured in from across the sports and media landscape. Barstool Sports founder Dave Portnoy expressed his grief, writing thatcalling it a cruel reminder that tomorrow is never promised.Cody Beef Franke, a "lover of the game of golf" who enjoyed helping others appreciate the game, was also remembered in a heartfelt statement released by the Fore Play team. His love of the game was contagious, they wrote, and ‚ÄúEveryone with a story about meeting Franke has regaled their social media followers with the details of exactly how personable, reachable, and kind he was when met in every instance. For years, he had been the hard-working, humble and appropriately described the nicest guy in golf media.
Article Summary: Cody "beef" franke, a former pga professional, has passed away at 31. He was the lead golf pro for barstool sports' fore play golf podcast. Franke's death has been called a "sudden medical event"

Article Title: Cardi B sparks controversy by turning Stefon Diggs‚Äô birthday into a cash-flashing Miami circus
Article Text:
Cardi B celebrated Stefon Diggs' birthday weekend in Miami with lively club appearances and flashy displays of wealth. The rapper also gifted Diggs a luxury Chanel bag, humorously suggesting it could be a diaper bag. Cardi B further showcased her unique style by turning part of their newborn's umbilical cord into gold jewelry, blending motherhood with her signature extravagance.

Cardi B‚Äôs gift choices and jewelry twist add drama to Diggs‚Äô big week

Nothing about Stefon Diggs‚Äô birthday weekend was ordinary, and Cardi B made sure of it. After twerking on the New England Patriots receiver during his celebration in Miami, the rapper doubled down with another headline-grabbing moment just a day later. She posted Instagram stories flashing stacks of cash, dancing with friends, and rapping along to her song ‚ÄúMagnet,‚Äù turning Sunday into a continuation of the on-going celebration.With the Patriots on a bye week, the Miami nightlife became their temporary stadium, and Cardi wasn‚Äôt just a guest, she was the entertainment. From leather-clad looks to neon hair and unapologetically flashy style, the rapper‚Äôs energy matched the momentum of Diggs‚Äô high-profile life on and off the field.Cardi‚Äôs highlights didn‚Äôt stop with Miami clubs, custom chains, and viral dance moves. Diggs received a $10,000 Chanel bag from executives Lori Hirshleifer and Marci Penn, and while the luxury gesture seemed fitting for a star wide receiver, Diggs jokingly hinted at a more practical use as a father.Posting the bag on Instagram, he wrote, ‚ÄúDiaper bag perhaps? Might need a couple. üòÇüòÇ Thank you so much ‚ù§Ô∏è,‚Äù reminding fans that the flashiness now comes with family responsibilities.The pair recently welcomed their first baby together, a boy born on Nov. 4, and Cardi marked the occasion in the most Cardi B way possible, by turning part of her newborn‚Äôs umbilical cord into gold jewelry. It‚Äôs not the typical keepsake new parents choose, but it perfectly fits Cardi‚Äôs unpredictable creative flair.While some celebrities tone down after parenthood, Cardi appears determined to merge motherhood with her signature extravagance, proving that her version of ‚Äúmom life‚Äù can coexist with late-night clubs, stacks of cash, and viral performances.With Diggs in his first season in New England, he‚Äôs spotlighted as much for his on-field comeback as he is for the bold new era of his personal life and Cardi B is setting the tone.Also Read: Cardi B cheers on Stefon Diggs‚Äô unexpected lifestyle brand launch as he shines in Patriots comeback season
Article Summary: Cardi b celebrated stefon diggs' birthday weekend in miami with lively club appearances and flashy displays of wealth. The rapper also gifted diggs a luxury chanel bag, humorously suggesting it could be a diaper bag. Cardi b further showcased her unique style by turning part of their newborn's umbilical cord into gold jewelry.

Article Title: Virat Kohli says 'I feel really free in my mind'
Article Text:
Virat Kohli (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Gautam Gambhir Press Conference: Team India head coach heaves fire after 2-1 ODI series win over SA

NEW DELHI: Virat Kohli has been in exceptional form, scoring 376 runs in his last four ODIs with two centuries and being dismissed only twice. After winning the Player of the Series award for his 302 runs in the three-match series against South Africa, Kohli said he felt liberated and in his best rhythm in years, contributing to India securing their 10th ODI series win out of the last 11 at home.His resurgence follows criticism after recording consecutive ducks in Australia. In the final ODI against South Africa, Kohli scored an unbeaten 65 off 45 balls as India chased down 271 in 39.5 overs."Honestly, playing the way I have in the series is the most satisfying thing for me. I feel really free in my mind. I haven't played like this in 2-3 years. The whole game is coming together nicely. I've tried to maintain my own standards and make an impact. I know when I can bat like that in the middle, it helps the team a long way. Makes me confident, any situation in the middle, I can handle that and bring it in favour of the team," Kohli said.Reflecting on his long journey, the former India captain admitted there were moments of doubt."When you play for that long - 15-16 years, you do doubt yourself. Especially as a batter when one mistake can get you out. It's a whole journey of self-improvement and personal growth along the way.It improves you as a person, and it improves your temperament as well. I'm just glad that I'm still able to contribute to the team," he shared.One standout feature of his recent form has been his six-hitting, with 12 sixes across the three matches and a strike rate above 100 in each outing."When I play freely, I know I can hit sixes. There are always levels you can always unlock," Kohli said about his approach.Kohli, who holds the world record with 53 ODI centuries, rated his 135 in Ranchi as his best knock of the series."The first one at Ranchi - because I hadn't played a game since Australia. Just how your energy is on the day, Ranchi is very special for me, and I'm very grateful for how these three games have gone," he said.Speaking about India stepping up in the deciding match, Kohli highlighted the team‚Äôs hunger in pressure moments."It's always brought the best of us - that's what we want to play for. When it's 1-1, we want to do something special for the team. That's why we have played for the team for so long. Just happy that both of us continue to do it for so long," he concluded.
Article Summary: Virat kohli has been in exceptional form, scoring 376 runs in his last four odis with two centuries and being dismissed only twice. India secured their 10th odi series win out of the last 11 at home. In the final odi against south africa, kohli scored an unbeaten 65 off 45 balls.

Article Title: Not Sachin Tendulkar or Virat Kohli! 'We all should be proud that he was born in our country': Former India captain gets applauded
Article Text:
India's 2011 ODI World Cup-winning team (Reuters Photo)

Fakhar Zaman interview: Power hitting, playing role of mentor in ILT20, hitting sixes & more

Former Indian cricket opener Murali Vijay has praised former captain MS Dhoni's enduring legacy in cricket. He emphasised Dhoni's natural leadership qualities and instinctive decision-making, particularly highlighting the memorable 2007 T20 World Cup final over given to Joginder Sharma.MS Dhoni, who now exclusively plays in the Indian Premier League (IPL), will continue with Chennai Super Kings (CSK) for the 2026 season. Murali Vijay's connection with Dhoni spans eight IPL seasons at CSK under his leadership.Vijay shared his thoughts about Dhoni during an appearance on Taruwar Kohli's YouTube channel, where he discussed Dhoni's hitting acumen and mental fortitude."Dhoni is natural and very unique. Those personalities you cannot replicate. Anybody cannot come and do what he is doing. The way he has dominated and taken the game, he was a very strong person. The way he launched those sixes, I don't think anyone else got that range as a right-hander," the former batter said."He gave that last over to Joginder, and we won it. There may not have been logic as Harbhajan had an over as a senior. But it won us the cup as he did something out of the box. We all should be proud that he was born in our country."Murali Vijay's international cricket journey began in 2008 when he stepped in for Gautam Gambhir in the final Test against Australia in Nagpur. His career encompassed 87 international matches across formats, including 61 Tests, 17 ODIs, and 9 T20Is.His final international appearance was against Australia in Perth in 2018. He played his last domestic matches for Tamil Nadu in 2019, with his final professional game coming in the IPL in September 2020.Throughout his international career, Vijay accumulated 4,490 runs with an average of 34.80 and a strike rate of 48.48. His achievements include 12 centuries and 16 fifties. In his IPL career, he scored 2,619 runs in 106 matches at an average of 25.93.
Article Summary: Murali vijay praises ms dhoni's leadership qualities and instinctive decision-making. Vijay played 87 international matches across formats, including 61 tests, 17 odis, and 9 t20is. His final international appearance was against australia in perth in 2018. In his ipl career, he scored 2,619 runs at an average of 25.93.

Article Title: Parker Washington injury update: Is Jaguars WR playing today vs. Colts?
Article Text:
Image via Corey Perrine/Florida Times-Union / USA TODAY NETWORK

How Parker Washington‚Äôs absence impacts Jacksonville‚Äôs offense?

Jaguars make roster adjustments ahead of Week 14

Also Read:

Jacksonville Jaguars wide receiver Parker Washington will not play in today‚Äôs Week 14 matchup against the Indianapolis Colts. The announcement comes after Washington was listed as questionable earlier in the week due to a hip injury suffered during Jacksonville‚Äôs win over the Tennessee Titans. Reports from NFL Network's Ian Rapoport on December 7 confirmed that the Jaguars are choosing caution, ruling him out.Washington exited last week‚Äôs game early and followed a DNP/limited/limited practice pattern heading into Sunday. Despite progress, the team determined he was not ready to return to full-speed action.Washington has played an important role this season as Jacksonville‚Äôs No. 3 wide receiver, contributing both as a pass-catcher and a return specialist. In 12 games so far, he has recorded 36 receptions for 447 yards and three touchdowns, with 23 receptions resulting in first downs. His special teams value has also been notable, adding two punt return touchdowns this year.Without him, the Jaguars will rely on a rotation to fill his role. Tim Patrick, Dyami Brown, and recently elevated receiver Austin Trammell are expected to split snaps behind starters Brian Thomas Jr.and Jakobi Meyers. Trammell is also expected to take over punt return duties.In preparation for Washington‚Äôs absence, the Jaguars made several roster moves on December 6. Safety Eric Murray was activated from injured reserve, and wide receiver Austin Trammell and defensive back Cam‚ÄôRon Silmon-Craig were elevated from the practice squad.Trammell‚Äôs elevation comes only days after he moved back to the practice squad, highlighting the coaching staff‚Äôs confidence in him as a depth option. Offensive coordinator Liam Coen has already stated that Dyami Brown and Tim Patrick will see expanded roles with Washington out.Today‚Äôs matchup holds major playoff implications. Both the Jaguars and Colts enter Week 14 with 8-4 records, tied at the top of the AFC South standings. Jacksonville has momentum, winning three straight games and four of its last five, while Indianapolis enters the contest on a two-game losing streak.Quarterback Trevor Lawrence leads a Jaguars offense averaging 202.8 passing yards per game, while running back Travis Etienne remains the team‚Äôs top rusher with 843 yards and five touchdowns. Defensively, the Jaguars rank first in the NFL in rushing yards allowed per game (82.4).While Washington‚Äôs absence will be felt, Jacksonville will look to maintain its recent form in a matchup that could help shape the AFC postseason picture. The game is scheduled to kick off at 1 p.m. ET.
Article Summary: Jacksonville jaguars wide receiver parker washington will not play in today's week 14 matchup against the indianapolis colts. Washington was listed as questionable earlier in the week due to a hip injury suffered during jacksonville‚Äôs win over the tennessee titans.

Article Title: ‚ÄúWe were 12 years old‚Äù- Luka Doncic‚Äôs fiancee Anamaria Goltes revealed intimate details of their relationship in throwback interview
Article Text:
Luka Doncic and Anamaria Goltes (Image via Getty)

Luka Doncic‚Äôs fiancee Aamaria Goltes reveals meeting him when she was only 12



Luka Doncic loves turning heads wherever he goes. The Los Angeles Lakers‚Äô star has established himself as one of the best athletes in the NBA currently. Despite always diverting the spotlight, Doncic prefers to keep his personal life away from the limelight. He recently welcomed his second daughter with his fiancee Anamaria Goltes.However, not many people know that Luka Doncic and Anamaria Goltes are childhood sweethearts. According to a revelation made by the NBA star‚Äôs finacee she met him when they were mere teenagers. Anamaria Goltes and the Lakers‚Äô star have dated each other for a very long period of time before getting engaged in the summer of 2023.During a live question and answer session on Instagram, Luka Doncic‚Äôs fiancee Anamaria Goltes, shared intimate details about their relationship. The Slovenian entrepreneur revealed meeting the Los Angeles Lakers‚Äô star when she was only 12. Goltes said,‚ÄúI answered this question like a million times. We met when we were 12 years old at the seaside in Croatia. Fun fact: We still have the same group of friends we had at that time. You keep the real ones, am I right?‚ÄùLuka Doncic and his fiancee Anamaria Goltes, recently embraced parenthood for the second time. The couple welcomed their second daughter, Olivia, after their older one, Gabriela, in 2023. The Los Angeles Lakers‚Äô star hardly talks about his personal life in front of the media. He tends to maintain the right balance between his personal and professional life. Doncic even posted a picture of his newborn daughter, Olivia, on Instagram recently.The couple now lives together with their three dogs‚ÄîViki, Gia, and Hugo. Although they have been together since 2016, their connection goes back many years earlier. Despite Donƒçiƒá playing in Spain and Goltes studying at the University of Ljubljana in Slovenia, they began dating in 2016. That summer, photos of them appeared on Donƒçiƒá‚Äôs Instagram, showing the pair spending time together across Europe and the United States. Their relationship grew steadily as they balanced distance and demanding schedules over time.Also Read: Luka Doncic‚Äôs unexpected act of kindness during Los Angeles Lakers game wins over the internet
Article Summary: Luka doncic‚Äôs fiancee aamaria goltes reveals meeting him when she was only 12 years old. The slovenian entrepreneur revealed meeting the los angeles lakers‚Äô star at the seaside in croatia. The couple got engaged in the summer of 2023 and recently welcomed their second daughter.

Article Title: F1 title winner Lando Norris‚Äô gets emotional as he hugs girlfriend Margarida Corceiro, here is his net worth and more
Article Text:
Lando Norris at Abu Dhabi Grand Prix (Image credit: F1/X)

Lando Norris‚Äô net worth



Lando Norris‚Äô family joins in the celebrations in Abu Dhabi

McLaren star Lando Norris clinched the 2025 F1 World Championship by winning the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix on Sunday. He managed to keep four-time title winner Max Verstappen behind in the Drivers‚Äô Standings, while also dashing teammate Oscar Piastri‚Äôs title hopes. Throughout the year, he kept his focus firmly on racing, even keeping his blooming relationship with Margarida ‚ÄúMagui‚Äù Corceiro out of the spotlight. Now, as he celebrates his maiden title with his family, here are some off-track details about Norris, including his net worth.Norris moved from the UK to Monaco to stay close to the motorsport hub and his fellow racers. At just 26, the fastest Briton on the current grid had a slow start to the season as his teammate Oscar Piastri registered one win after another. But he eventually picked up momentum in the second half, rising to the top of the Drivers‚Äô Standings. His determination paid off as he went on to win the F1 World Championship just a year after securing his maiden Formula 1 victory in Miami.In 2024, Norris received a contract extension with McLaren and is confirmed to stay with the team until the end of the 2027 season. With McLaren boasting the fastest car on the grid this year, there is little doubt that the new champion would look anywhere else.According to multiple reports, including The Mirror US, he earns approximately $21.35 million annually.Last year, Forbes ranked him third on the 2024 list of Highest Paid F1 Drivers, with total earnings of $35 million, while Max Verstappen topped the list with $74 million.Norris was also named in the 30 Under 30 Europe ‚Äì Sports category in 2024, the year he finished runner-up in the F1 Championship as Verstappen claimed his fourth title.After the race, Lando Norris‚Äô mother, dressed in an orange kurta and matching hairbands, rushed to him and wrapped him in a celebratory hug. The wholesome moment was shared by F1 as part of the podium celebrations in Abu Dhabi. He also shared a long hug with his Portuguese model Margarida Corceiro, who was dressed in black.A happy Norris said after the race, ‚ÄúIt is incredible. It is pretty surreal. I dreamed of this for along, long time - I mean everyone does. A lot goes into a second like this, a lot of ups, a lot of downs. But none of that matters if you come out on top. But I did it with an incredible team. And it is not just this year, the last seven, eight years with McLaren, the last 16, 17 years of my life trying to chase my dream. My best performances this year came when I needed them the most - the second half of the season when I was on the back foot, and I managed to show the best of me. ‚ÄùNorris also congratulated thanked Verstappen and Piastri for giving him a tough competition.Also Read: Abu Dhabi Grand Prix: Kelly Piquet kisses Max Verstappen as he bags pole; Lando Norris says, ‚ÄúIt is tough‚Äù
Article Summary: Mclaren star lando norris clinched the 2025 f1 world championship by winning the abu dhabi grand prix on sunday. He managed to keep four-time title winner max verstappen behind in the drivers‚Äô standings, while also dashing teammate oscar piastri‚Äôs title hopes. Here are some off-track details about norris, including his net worth.

Article Title: Max Verstappen wins Abu Dhabi Grand Prix, but Lando Norris steals the show with F1 World Championship triumph
Article Text:
Max Verstappen and Lando Norris at Abu Dhabi Grand Prix (Image credit: F1/X)

Abu Dhabi Grand Prix 2025 final

What were the odds of Lando Norris winning the F1 title?

It was a day for the books at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix as Max Verstappen won the race but Lando Norris won the Formula 1 2025 championship amid a down-to-the-wire fight. Oscar Piastri finished second and Lando Norris finished third in the Sunday race but was enough for the latter to bring in the title. Norris has shown one of the most exemplary examples of consistent performance by winning his first F1 race in Miami last year and winning the championship a year later.Lando Norris was the overall champion even after finishing third at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix. He said soon after the race, ‚ÄúI didn't think I would cry but I did. It is a long journey. I want to say a big thanks to my guys, everyone at McLaren, my parents. I now know what Max feels like a little bit! I want to congratulate Max and Oscar as well, it has been a pleasure to race against both of them, and to learn from both of them. But we did it, we did it!‚ÄùMax Verstappen, 28, won the pole and was followed by Lando Norris, 26, in second and Oscar Piastri, 26, in third. This was one of the most enthralling F1 Championship finals in a decade, with as many as three drivers in contention for the title. While Piastri was at 392 points, Verstappen was at 396 and Norris at 408 in the Drivers‚Äô Standings. But things went smoothly for Norris, bringing him his first F1 World Championship title.Pole-sitter Verstappen was aware of McLaren‚Äôs capabilities of overtaking him and had rightly said ahead of the final, ‚ÄúSlept good.Ready to go. The plan is to win the race, and rely on a bit of luck from behind.‚ÄùMcLaren CEO Zak Brown had made it clear they wouldn‚Äôt compromise on their chances of winning the Drivers‚Äô Championship if it came to asking one of the drivers to sacrifice and support the other to win the title. Piastri‚Äôs fans even doubted whether the sacrifice had already been made on his part, as the driver was replaced by a rookie in FP1 and had terrible FP2 and FP3 sessions. But he made a comeback in Qualifying by finishing third. ‚ÄúUntil Lando or Max cross the line in front of me, I‚Äôve still got a chance of winning the title,‚Äù Piastri said ahead of the final.Lando Norris would have easily won the F1 title had he finished anywhere in the top four, with Verstappen finishing 2nd or lower at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix. On the other hand, Verstappen would have won the title only if he had won the Sunday final and Norris hadn‚Äôt finished in the top three. Piastri could win the championship only if he won the Abu Dhabi race, with Norris finishing below 6th position and Verstappen ranking second or lower.The Abu Dhabi Grand Prix was a star-studded affair, with several sports and Hollywood celebrities in attendance. Among them were Italian tennis star Jannik Sinner and actor Ana de Armas as well.Also Read: Abu Dhabi Grand Prix: Kelly Piquet kisses Max Verstappen as he bags pole; Lando Norris says, ‚ÄúIt is tough‚Äù
Article Summary: Max verstappen won the abu dhabi grand prix and lando norris finished third. Oscar piastri finished second and norris third in the sunday race. Norris won the formula 1 2025 championship amid a down-to-the-wire fight. This was one of the most enthralling f1 championship finals in a decade.

Article Title: Alix Earle celebrates single life in Miami with dazzling night out following her split from Braxton Berrios
Article Text:
Alix Earle‚Äôs Miami party moment goes viral after split with Braxton Berrios (Photo: Shutterstock)

Alix Earle shines in Miami after breakup with Braxton Berrios



Alix Earle Miami Party After Braxton Berrios Breakup (Shutterstock)

Alix Earle stepped into Miami‚Äôs brightest spotlight this weekend, and the timing could not have been more striking. Hours after news surfaced that she and NFL wide receiver Braxton Berrios had ended their two-year relationship, the ‚ÄúDancing With The Stars‚Äù finalist arrived at NYLON House looking radiant in a white mini dress. Her smile stayed steady through the night, suggesting she is choosing joy even as her personal life shifts.The split, confirmed by multiple outlets, came after months of long-distance strain. A source close to Earle told the Daily Mail: ‚ÄúAlix has not been happy with the direction their relationship is going in. They spend a lot of time apart and just spent Thanksgiving apart. She's happy in Los Angeles and is preparing for the DWTS Tour. Braxton is in Texas for football and he doesn't have much downtime.‚ÄùEarle‚Äôs weekend in Miami aligned with Art Basel, a scene tailor-made for her social presence. She stopped by a SipMARGS event, waving to fans and posing with friends. Witnesses said she looked relaxed, enjoying the music and energy as if she were reclaiming some breathing room. Dressed in a sheer white mini dress with a garter belt and stockings, she carried herself with confidence and ease.The outing marked her first major appearance since Berrios missed the ‚ÄúDWTS‚Äù finale. She had already clarified that his absence was because of football, not relationship trouble, yet the chatter intensified until Page Six confirmed their split. The two had once navigated bi-coastal schedules, with Earle often in Los Angeles or Miami while Berrios trained in Texas under a one-year, $2 million Texans contract. They managed brief reunions, including a lavish birthday celebration in October when Berrios said: ‚ÄúI hope everybody gets to feel as loved as I felt this weekend. There‚Äôs nothing better than being surrounded by the people you love that traveled across the country to be there for you. Alix I don't know how you pulled this surprise off but I'm so thankful you did. What a way to start 30!‚ÄùDespite that affection, long distance eventually caught up with them. While Earle danced her way through Miami‚Äôs busiest art week, Berrios prepared for a crucial Texans game against the Kansas City Chiefs.Surrounded by celebrities and friends, Earle looked every bit like someone settling into the next chapter on her own terms.Also Read: Tom Brady can‚Äôt contain himself after Caleb Williams unleashes jaw-dropping laser touchdown against Packers
Article Summary: Alix earle and nfl wide receiver braxton berrios have ended their two-year relationship. The split, confirmed by multiple outlets, came after months of long-distance strain. A source close to earle told the daily mail: "alix has not been happy with the direction their relationship is going in"

Article Title: Tom Brady can‚Äôt contain himself after Caleb Williams unleashes jaw-dropping laser touchdown against Packers
Article Text:
Tom Brady gushes over Caleb Williams‚Äô pinpoint laser touchdown (Getty Images)

Caleb Williams ‚Äô surgical touchdown pass sparks the Bears



The Chicago Bears walked into the afternoon matchup against the Green Bay Packers with hopes of finding rhythm, but the first half offered very little to build on. The offense struggled to move the ball, finishing the opening two quarters with fewer than 100 yards. Every snap looked forced. Every drive looked slower than the last. The Packers controlled the line of scrimmage, and the Bears looked like they were searching for any spark that could lift them back into the game. Nothing seemed to work, and the three points on the scoreboard felt like a generous outcome.Things shifted the moment the second half began. Chicago‚Äôs defense opened with a strong stand and forced a quick punt, handing the ball back to the offense with a chance to answer. What followed was the type of response the Bears had been waiting for all day. It unfolded on live television as Tom Brady lit up in real time over the play that changed the tone of the afternoon. His reaction was full of excitement, highlighted by his call: "I like the idea of getting caleb outside of the pocket. . drops it down, barely through the arms of Nixon in coverage... and finds Zaccheaus. What a catch! What a great camera angle, side-arm delivery, through Nixon's arms and then finds Zaccheaus ... from the pylon cam, what a drive, KB!"Caleb Williams took control of the moment with a crisp and confident 10-play drive that reminded everyone why he is so highly regarded.He executed the play-action fake, rolled right, and delivered a perfect ball to Olamide Zaccheaus. The pass arrived inches before Zaccheaus reached the boundary, placed exactly where only he could secure it. The alternate end-zone angle Brady mentioned made the throw look even more impressive. It captured the precision, the timing and the trust between quarterback and receiver.For a team that had stumbled through two frustrating quarters, this touchdown felt like oxygen. Williams had been off the mark earlier, and the defense had already surrendered two explosive scores. Yet this single throw cut through all of it. No defender had a chance at it, and Zaccheaus‚Äô grip sealed the play.If the Bears hope to build momentum in the weeks ahead, more moments like this from Williams will be essential.Also Read: Shedeur Sanders‚Äô mom Pilar steals the show with explosive tirade at Browns coaches in middle of Titans matchup
Article Summary: Caleb williams‚Äô surgical touchdown pass sparks the bears back into the game. Tom brady lit up in real time over the play that changed the tone of the afternoon. The pass arrived inches before zaccheaus reached the boundary, placed exactly where only he could secure it.

Article Title: Travis Kelce shows up in icy all-black look as Chiefs face make-or-break matchup vs. Texans
Article Text: Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce arrived for a crucial game against the Houston Texans exuding icy confidence. Facing a potential playoff miss, the veteran acknowledged the team's dire situation but insisted talent isn't the issue, blaming small errors. Kelce, despite his age and contract status, remains a top performer, ready to fight for survival in the frigid weather.
Article Summary: Travis kelce insists talent isn't the issue, blaming small errors. Kelce, despite his age and contract status, remains a top performer, ready to fight for survival in the frigid weather. The kansas city chiefs face the houston texans on sunday.

Article Title: Shedeur Sanders‚Äô mom Pilar steals the show with explosive tirade at Browns coaches in middle of Titans matchup
Article Text:
Shedeur Sanders' mom Pilar (Getty Images)

Shedeur Sanders‚Äô mom goes after Browns coaches



The Cleveland Browns watched their playoff hopes slip away long before the final whistle in Tennessee. Their loss to the two-win Titans sealed their elimination from the AFC race, a moment many fans expected weeks ago. What stings more is how close the team was to keeping the season alive. Right after their win over the Las Vegas Raiders, there was a tiny window where Cleveland held an 8 percent playoff chance if they managed to run the table and finish 9-8. That window shut fast.Cleveland now sits at 3-10, and even with flashes of strong play from rookie quarterback Shedeur Sanders, the reality settled in quickly. The shock is not that they are out. What surprises many is that the Browns could still finish tied for first in the AFC North at 7-10 when Week 18 ends. That twist adds another strange layer to a season full of conflicting storylines, including a sideline moment that turned into a viral storm.Shedeur Sanders was on the sideline when another Sanders stole the spotlight. His mom, Pilar, made sure her voice rang louder than the cheers in Cleveland‚Äôs section.While Coach Prime hugged his son before kickoff, Pilar focused on something entirely different. She hated how head coach Kevin Stefanski and the offensive staff kept taking the ball out of Shedeur‚Äôs hands.During the game, Pilar filmed herself in Instagram Reels, wrapped in a furry winter coat yet looking composed and confident. Her message, though, was fiery. She stared into the camera and said, "You know, this fking wildcat, is bullst." An hour later, after Shedeur threw a touchdown, she returned with proof for everyone watching. "Whew. See what happens when you don't do the wildcat." She captioned the clip, "LET SHEDEUR COOK!!!!!"For fans unfamiliar with football tactics, the wildcat removes the quarterback from the play and places the snap in the hands of a running back. Pilar has long pushed back against anyone who limits her son, even calling out Rex Ryan earlier this season. She shows up at almost all of Shedeur‚Äôs games, even when he sat third on the depth chart. Deion has said he would only attend when Shedeur is QB1.Through highs and lows, one thing remains constant. Shedeur‚Äôs mom will always have his back.Also Read: Deion Sanders‚Äô surprise Browns visit creates touching father-son moment amid Shedeur Sanders‚Äô major NFL strides
Article Summary: Shedeur sanders' mom, pilar, took to instagram to voice her displeasure with the browns. She called out the offensive staff for taking the ball out of shedeur's hands. Pilar has long pushed back against anyone who limits her son, including rex ryan.

Article Title: Wilt Chamberlain drops a blunt verdict on Kareem Abdul-Jabbar that shatters image of Showtime Los Angeles Lakers
Article Text:
(Image Source - Getty Images)

Wilt Chamberlain calls Kareem Abdul-Jabbar the weak link on the Showtime Los Angeles Lakers

The NBA in the 1980s was defined by intensity, pride, and rivalries that felt larger than life, with the Los Angeles Lakers at the center of it all. Showtime transformed into a full-blown Hollywood spectacle, a flurry of fast-paced plays and bright lights spearheaded by Magic Johnson. Yet, underneath all that glamour was a rising tension that only a legend like Wilt Chamberlain had the courage to speak out about.Back in 1986, during a heated debate, Chamberlain locked eyes with Kareem Abdul-Jabbar , his former rival and the steady backbone of the Lakers dynasty, and unleashed a critique that left everyone stunned. He pointed out Abdul-Jabbar‚Äôs transition game, saying that the veteran star was throwing off the rhythm that had made the Lakers a powerhouse. It was a tense moment, charged with years of rivalry, personal pride, and the legacy of two Hall of Fame careers. The Lakers were on a roll at 35-9, dominating the league, but Wilt sensed there was more going on beneath the surface of the Showtime sparkle. With the Celtics coming up, the pace quickening, and the pressure rising, his words landed like a challenge.Wilt Chamberlain, the towering 7-foot-1 scoring powerhouse who ruled the 1960s with his 100-point games and four MVP awards, had a legendary rivalry with Abdul-Jabbar.They went head-to-head 94 times, with Chamberlain leading 52-42. By the 1980s, although Chamberlain was retired, he stayed an active commentator, frequently showing up on TV to analyze the game.During a TV debate in January 1986 about the Lakers' dynasty, which included both Chamberlain and Abdul-Jabbar, Chamberlain didn't hold back on his criticism. Addressing the panel and the audience, he stated, "I like to be blunt. I think that the weak link surprisingly enough on this fantastic Laker team is Kareem. Why? Well, because his transition game is the worst I've ever seen, but remarkably so at the end of the game, he is the best out there. "The remark came during the Lakers' pursuit of the championship; they had a record of 35-9 at that moment. Chamberlain recognized Abdul-Jabbar's ability to perform under pressure but pointed out that the center's slow approach didn't mesh well with the fast-paced Showtime style.Abdul-Jabbar was there for the conversation but chose not to reply on air. Their shared background added tension: both were raised in Philadelphia and had been part of the same draft class in 1960, but a sense of rivalry remained.This wasn't just small talk. In his 1991 autobiography A View from Above, Chamberlain reflected on the same ideas regarding the evolution of great players, commending Abdul-Jabbar's fundamentals while also pointing out the shift towards athleticism in that era.Also Read: Why the NBA fined Philadelphia 76ers 100K for an incorrect injury report?
Article Summary: Wilt chamberlain called kareem abdul-jabbar the weak link on the showtime los angeles lakers in 1986. The lakers were on a roll at 35-9, dominating the league, but wilt sensed there was more going on beneath the surface of the showtime sparkle.
